text: Jesse Myles (September 28, 1960 – March 7, 2010) was an American football running back. He played for the Denver Broncos from 1983 to 1984. He died on March 7, 2010, in Gray, Louisiana at age 49. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2010 deaths Category:American football running backs Category:LSU Tigers football players Category:Denver Broncos players
title: Jesse Myles
